title: Introduction to CKB Script Programming 2: Script Basics
description: Last post introduced current CKB's validation model. This post will get more fun, since we will show how to deploy script codes to CKB for real. I'm hoping after this post, you should be able to explore the CKB world and work on new script codes as you wish.
